resources.string: It allows you to find the nearest places from a given station.
We have placed the below search options: (All search options will work on 24hrs format ONLY)
Up on selection of any route respective stations in the route will be populated in a dropdown. After selecting a station , please select FROM-TO time in 24hr format ONLY.
It allows you to find where is your train at this point of time. If have used short codes in this version.
Displays trains for a chosen source and destination in a given time range. Upon selecting a train from displayed list, you can see the train timings.
